name: FilteredElementCollector
description: The FilteredElementCollector class is used to query elements in a document. It provides a powerful API for filtering and selecting elements.

properties.name: Count
properties.description: Gets the number of elements in the collector.

methods.name: ToElements()
methods.description: Gets all elements in the collector.

methods.name: ToElementIds()
methods.description: Gets the IDs of all elements in the collector.

methods.name: FirstElement()
methods.description: Gets the first element in the collector.

methods.name: OfType<T>()
methods.description: Returns elements of a specific type.
